005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import javax.xml.XMLConstants;
009import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014public interface INamed {
015
016  /**
017   * Retrieve the name of the model element.
018   *
019   * @return the name
020   */
021  @NonNull
022  String getName();
023
024  /**
025   * Retrieve the name to use for the model element, instead of the name.
026   *
027   * @return the use name or {@code null} if no use name is defined
028   */
029  // from INamedModelElement
030  @Nullable
031  default String getUseName() {
032    // no use-name by default
033    return null;
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Get the name to use based on the provided names. This method will return the
038   * use name provided by {@link #getUseName()} if the call is not {@code null},
039   * and fall back to the name provided by {@link #getName()} otherwise. This is
040   * the model name to use for the for an instance where the instance is
041   * referenced.
042   *
043   * @return the use name if available, or the name if not
044   *
045   * @see #getUseName()
046   * @see #getName()
047   */
048  // from INamedModelElement
049  @NonNull
050  default String getEffectiveName() {
051    @Nullable
052    String useName = getUseName();
053    return useName == null ? getName() : useName;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Retrieve the XML namespace for this instance.
058   * <p>
059   * Multiple calls to this method are expected to produce the same, deterministic
060   * return value.
061   *
062   * @return the XML namespace or {@code null} if no namespace is defined
063   */
064  @Nullable
065  default String getXmlNamespace() {
066    return getXmlQName().getNamespaceURI();
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Get the unique XML qualified name for this model element.
071   * <p>
072   * The qualified name is considered to be unique relative to all sibling
073   * elements. For a flag, this name will be unique among all flag instances on
074   * the same field or assembly definition. For a field or assembly, this name
075   * will be unique among all sibling field or assembly instances on the same
076   * assembly definition.
077   * <p>
078   * Multiple calls to this method are expected to produce the same, deterministic
079   * return value.
080   * <p>
081   * If {@link #getXmlNamespace()} is {@code null}, the the resulting QName will
082   * have the namespace {@link XMLConstants#NULL_NS_URI}.
083   * <p>
084   * This implementation may be overridden by implementation that cache the QName
085   * or provide for a more efficient method for QName creation.
086   *
087   * @return the XML qualified name, or {@code null} if there isn't one
088   */
089  // REFACTOR: rename to getQName
090  @NonNull
091  QName getXmlQName();
092
093  /**
094   * Retrieve the index value to use for binary naming.
095   *
096   * @return the name index or {@code null} if no name index is defined
097   */
098  // from INamedModelElement
099  @Nullable
100  default Integer getIndex() {
101    // no index by default
102    return null;
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Retrieve the index value to use for binary naming, instead of the name.
107   *
108   * @return the use name index or {@code null} if no use name index is defined
109   */
110  // from INamedModelElement
111  @Nullable
112  default Integer getUseIndex() {
113    // no use-name index by default
114    return null;
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Get the index value to use for binary naming based on the provided index
119   * values.
120   * <p>
121   * This method will return the use index value provided by
122   * {@link #getUseIndex()} if the call result is not {@code null}, and fall back
123   * to the index value provided by {@link #getIndex()} otherwise.
124   *
125   * @return the index value if available, or {@code null} otherwise
126   */
127  // from INamedModelElement
128  @Nullable
129  default Integer getEffectiveIndex() {
130    @Nullable
131    Integer useIndex = getUseIndex();
132    return useIndex == null ? getIndex() : useIndex;
133  }
134}
